TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/SmallFrameRight extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the right border of a small window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameRight class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the right border of a small window, such as a tool window.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameRight.Active%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowSmallFrameRight1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#359](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.v_21_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#359](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.v_21_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the right border of an active small window.
Docs.value: A that represents the right border of an active small window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Active property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Active property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowSmallFrameRight1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#359](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/56cde0e0-a650-467a-bfb0-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#359](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/56cde0e0-a650-467a-bfb0-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the right border of an inactive small window.
Docs.value: A that represents the right border of an inactive small window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Inactive property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Inactive property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowSmallFrameRight2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#360](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/1a92b104-c0c4-465b-a13c-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#360](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/1a92b104-c0c4-465b-a13c-_1.vb)]
